28.The project closure process includes all of the following except:
A.Shutting down resources and releasing to new uses
B.Reassigning project team members
C.Conduct an audit
D.Getting delivery acceptance from the customer

help: Releasing the project team typically occurs gradually during the closure phase. For many people, terminationof their responsible activities ends before the project is delivered to the customer or user. Sincemany work invoices are not submitted until after the project is officially over, closing out contracts isoften messy and filled with untied ends. Finally getting delivery acceptance by the customer is a major andcritical closure activity.
